text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Spe-chan, are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh…?! Ah, I'm fine, I'm fine! There's nothing wrong!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …That aside, Sei-chan and King-chan were both really strong. Way stronger than they were at [Yayoi Sho]…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: On that final straight, I could catch up… I could pass them, that's what I believed. Since I knew that they were running out of stamina.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But, no matter how hard I chased I couldn't pass them…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: From what I saw, there wasn't any issue with the way you handled the race, and I don't think Spe-chan's abilities were lacking.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It's just, spirit… maybe. Those two, particularly Seiun Sky-san's running, I could feel something awe-inspiring that I can't quite put in to words.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Spirit… you think?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: If you can't understand that difference, then I'll be the one who's definitely going to win.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The [Satsuki Sho]…I will win, without fail.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Huh…?)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Is something wrong, Spe-chan?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Before the race, Sei-chan told me. That our reasons for running are similar but a little different.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And if I didn't understand that difference, that she would win…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Um, Suzuka-san's dream… your reason for running, is because you want to see the "scenery" from the front, right?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the scenery I saw when I was small…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The exhilaration I felt at that time, remained in my heart, that's why I run. For my own self-satisfaction.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …but, is there something weird about that?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, no! I just wanted to hear it directly.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Suzuka-san's dream… is for her own self-satisfaction…)

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The reason I run, in the end, it's for my own sake. That's why it's a little different from Spe-chan's, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Sei-chan and Suzuka-san too, they're both running for their own sake…)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (My dream is to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"… but that's a dream that was entrusted to me by my moms…)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (But what's MY dream…? For what reason do I run…?)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: -Spe-chan, looks like she's taken quite a shock…
When she lost in her second race, she was really quick to rebound though.
When she lost in her second race, she was really quick to rebound though.
As I thought, it's probably because the goal she thought of herself, becoming a "Triple Crown Uma Musume", was crushed so quickly…
As I thought, it's probably because the goal she thought of herself, becoming a "Triple Crown Uma Musume", was crushed so quickly…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …I get the feeling that that's not the reason though.
What do you mean…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I can't really say for sure but, it's not so much the race results, but something more related to her feelings, I think…
There seems to be something other than losing that has her down. For someone who was so earnestly chasing her dream to be so down…
Anyways, so that Spe can keep running while looking to the future, I'll do my best to support her.
I may even need everyone in Sirius to help me out. When that time comes, I'll need your help too, Suzuka.
I may even need everyone in Sirius to help me out. When that time comes, I'll need your help too, Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, understood.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Fuu… fuu… alright, goal!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Fuu～…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That was 2400m just now, the same distance as the [Derby]. Spe-chan hasn't run this distance in a real race yet, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But you know, this distance of 2400m is more than just a number, it's a place where there's drama! Dreams! It's packed with so many… uuu…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Dreams…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Um, Chikezo-san's dream was to win in the [Derby], and the reason you started running was to take hold of that dream yourself, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, ever since I was little!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The first time I saw the [Derby] I was hooked. I thought, this is the race I want to enter, and definitely win!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And like that, you grasped your dream…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The reason I won the [Derby], even now I believe I won because my feelings for winning were stronger than anyone else's.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The dream I decided on for myself — those feelings kept building up. Since I decided that I would win for sure, I was able to keep working hard.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Though when it comes to studying I can't work hard at all! Ahahaaa!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: A dream you decided on yourself…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: For the sake of proving that I'm first class, I will continue to win!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I'm running for my own sake, that's why… because of that, I'll definitely win.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Chikezo-san, McQueen-san, and Suzuka-san, everyone's running towards a dream that they've decided on, aren't they?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hm…? Spe-chan is also running towards a dream, right? The dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Well, yeah… that's true but…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (The promise I made with mom, the dream of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"-)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I've always thought that that was my dream but, it feels like it's completely different from everyone else's…)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Not someone else's dream, but a dream that I've decided on for myself… what's my reason for running…?)

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: …Well I'll be, to think I'd be this worried.
